FuncDef: The display virtual-cluster-access vp hop command displays information about VP forwarding entries.
CLIs: display virtual-cluster-access vp hop [ source <source-ip-address> ] [ destination <destination-ip-address> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about VP forwarding entries with a specified source address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Displays information about VP forwarding entries with a specified destination address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Examples: Hop Information :                             In Label     Out Label
Hop Information :                             In Label     Out Label
Hop Information :                             In Label     Out Label
Hop Information :                             In Label     Out Label
ExtraInfo: After you configure virtual cluster access, run the display virtual-cluster-access vp hop command to view information about VP forwarding entries, including the IP address of each hop, outbound interface, and label information.
